    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ACTL
    This class is the base of ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLAlways
    This class defines the AG formulae in ACTL.
    class  ACTLAnd
    This class defines conjunctive ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLAtomic
    This class defines atomic ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLBinary
    This class defines binary ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLNegation
    This class defines the negative propositions in ACTL.
    class  ACTLNext
    This class defines the AX formulae in ACTL.
    class  ACTLOr
    This class defines disjunctive ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLRelease
    This class defines AR formulae.
    class  ACTLSometime
    This class defines the AF formulae in ACTL.
    class  ACTLUnary
    This class defines unary ACTL formulae.
    class  ACTLUntil
    This class defines AU formulae.

  • Uses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl

    Subclasses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  LTL
    This class provides common methods for LTL formulae.
    class  LTLAlways
    This class represents LTL formulae in "[] f" form.
    class  LTLAnd
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f ∧ g" form.
    class  LTLAtomic
    This class represents the atomic propositions in LTL.
    class  LTLBackto
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f B g" form.
    class  LTLBefore
    This class represents LTL formulae in "(~) f" form.
    class  LTLBinary
    This class represents LTL formulae formed by a binary operator, for example "f U g", "f R g", "f S g", "f B g", "f T g", "f --> g", or "f <--> g".
    class  LTLEquivalence
    This class represents LTL formulae in "(f <--> g)" form.
    class  LTLImplication
    This class represents LTL formulae in "(f --> g)" form.
    class  LTLNegation
    This class represents LTL formulae in "~ f" form.
    class  LTLNext
    This class represents LTL formulae in "() f" form.
    class  LTLOnce
    This class represents LTL formulae in "<-> f" form.
    class  LTLOr
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f1 ∨ f2 ∨ ...
    class  LTLPrevious
    This class represents LTL formulae in "(-) f" form.
    class  LTLRelease
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f R g" form.
    class  LTLSince
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f S g" form.
    class  LTLSofar
    This class represents LTL formula in "[-] f" form.
    class  LTLSometime
    This class represents LTL formulae in "<> f" form.
    class  LTLTrigger
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f T g" form.
    class  LTLUnary
    This class represents LTL formulae obtained by applying a unary operator to a LTL formula, for example, "~ f", "() f", "<> f", "[] f", "(-) f", "(~) f", "<-> f", and "[-] f".
    class  LTLUnless
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f W g" form.
    class  LTLUntil
    This class represents LTL formulae in "f U g" form.

  • Uses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional

    Subclasses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PL
    This class defines propositional formulae.
    class  PLAnd
    This class defines formulae of the form p ∧ q where p and q are propositional formulae.
    class  PLAtomic
    This class defines atomic propositions in propositional logic.
    class  PLBinary
    This class defines binary propositional formulae.
    class  PLEquivalence
    This class defines equivalence formulae l ↔ r where l and r are propositional formulae.
    class  PLImplication
    This class defines an implication formula l → r where l and r are propositional formulae.
    class  PLNegation
    This class defines negated propositional formulae.
    class  PLOr
    This class defines formulae of the form p ∨ q where p and q are propositional formulae.
    class  PLUnary
    This class defines unary propositional formulae.

  • Uses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl

    Subclasses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.qptl 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  QPTL
    This class provides common methods for QPTL formulae.
    class  QPTLAlways
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "[] f" form.
    class  QPTLAnd
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f ∧ g" form.
    class  QPTLAtomic
    This class represents the atomic propositions in QPTL.
    class  QPTLBackto
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f B g" form.
    class  QPTLBefore
    This class represents QPTL formulae in (~) f" form.
    class  QPTLBinary
    This class represents QPTL formulae formed by a binary operator, for example "f U g", "f R g", "f S g", "f B g", "f T g", "f --> g", or "f <--> g".
    class  QPTLEquivalence
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f <--> g" form.
    class  QPTLExists
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "E t : f(t)" form.
    class  QPTLForall
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "A t : f(t)" form.
    class  QPTLImplication
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f --> g" form.
    class  QPTLNegation
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "~ f" form.
    class  QPTLNext
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "() f" form.
    class  QPTLOnce
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "<-> f" form.
    class  QPTLOr
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f1 ∨ g" form.
    class  QPTLParenthesis
    This class represents a QPTL formula enclosed by parentheses.
    class  QPTLPrevious
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "(-) f" form.
    class  QPTLQuantification
    This class represents QPTL formulae with an out-most quantifier.
    class  QPTLRelease
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f R g" form.
    class  QPTLSince
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f S g" form.
    class  QPTLSofar
    This class represents QPTL formula in "[-] f" form.
    class  QPTLSometime
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "<> f" form.
    class  QPTLTrigger
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f T g" form.
    class  QPTLUnary
    This class represents QPTL formulae obtained by applying a unary operator to a QPTL formula, for example, "~ f", "() f", "<> f", "[] f", "(-) f", "(~) f", "<-> f", and "[-] f".
    class  QPTLUnless
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f W g" form.
    class  QPTLUntil
    This class represents QPTL formulae in "f U g" form.

  • Uses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re

    Subclasses of Logic in org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.re 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  REAtomic
    This class represents atomic symbols in the regular expressions.
    class  REConcatenation
    This class represents the concatenation of two regular expressions.
    class  REEmpty
    This class represents a regular expression that contains no strings.
    class  REEpsilon
    This class represents the epsilon expression.
    class  RegularExpression
    This class provides an abstraction of ω regular expressions.
    class  REPlus
    This class represents the Kleene cross of a regular expression, denoted by a+ which is equivalent to a.a*.
    class  REQuestion
    This class represents the zero or one occurrence of a regular expression, denoted by a? which is equivalent to (e|a).
    class  REStar
    This class represents the Kleene star of a regular expression.
    class  REUnion
    This class represents the union of two regular expressions.

    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractTranslator<L extends Logic,​A extends Automaton>
    This class provides a default implementation of Translator.
    class  TranslateToNBWByNGBW<T extends Logic>
    This is a translator from a logic formula to an equivalent NBW by utilizing another translator from formulae of that logic to equivalent NGBW.
    class  TranslateToNGBWByLOSNGBW<T extends Logic>
    This is a translator from a logic formula to an equivalent NGBW by utilizing another translator from formulae of that logic to equivalent label-on-state NGBW.
    interface  Translator<T extends Logic,​A extends Automaton>
    This is an interface for translators from a logic formula to an automaton.
    Methods in org.svvrl.goal.core.tran with type parameters of type Logic

    protected <O extends Logic,​ U extends Automaton>
    U    		 AbstractTranslator.translate​(Translator<O,​U> tran, O formula)
    Returns an automaton translated from a specified logic formula by another specified translator as a sub-algorithm of this translator.
